pages.text: You didn't randomly choose the name of the Radiance Pin to resemble the [Radiance Staff](book://magical_items/radiance_staff).\If you are in a dark area, the pin automatically creates an invisible light on you. Unlike the lights of the [Radiance Staff](book://magical_items/radiance_staff), however, they slowly become fainter and fainter until they eventually dissipate completely.
